To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private CoppockCurve _cc;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_cc = CC(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_cc.IsReady)
{
    var current = _cc.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.cc = self.CC(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.cc.IsReady:
    current = self.cc.Current.Value
